pkgmetadata.longdescription: Lua support for fcitx. It tries to support lua in fcitx in two ways. 1. An addon loader for lua, which supports Type=Lua addon. 2. The googlepinyin api, which is provided by imeapi addon. You may put your lua file under $HOME/.local/share/fcitx5/lua/imeapi/extensions to make the addon find your scripts.

use.flag: Use dlopen to load lua library
